articles.description: Equity mutual funds saw a net inflow of  ₹7,505 crore in July 2023, down from  ₹8,245 crore in June, according to AMFI data. ETFs had an outflow of  ₹353 crore in July, compared to inflows of  ₹3,402 crore in June.
articles.content: The equity mutual funds have witnessed a net inflow of 7,625.96 crore in July 2023 as against an inflow of 8,637 crore in June 2023, according to Association of Mutual Funds in India (AMFI) data. As … [+5671 chars]
